item.name: Authentication
Login

request.description: Signs In the user Create and Return the api token

item.name: Logout

request.description: Signs Out the user and destroy's the api token

item.name: Endpoints
POST api/login
Display a listing of the resource.
Store a newly created resource in storage.
Display the specified resource.
PUT api/v1/users/{id}
Remove the specified resource from storage.
GET api/v1/authors/{author_id}/posts
Display a listing of the resource.
